alert.note: Alert for Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Murray and southeastern Whitfield Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Nickelsville, or 10 miles southwest of Chatsworth, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton and North Georgia Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
